get.description:
Returns a paginated list of **Transaction** with **all** requested filters.

* `size=0` → return **every** matching row (no pagination).  
* All enum fields appear as **dropdowns** in Swagger.  
* Date fields use the **date picker**.

Returns a paginated list of **Transaction** with **all** requested filters.

* `size=0` → return **every** matching row (no pagination).  
* All enum fields appear as **dropdowns** in Swagger.  
* Date fields use the **date picker**.

post.description:
Executes all **regular** autopays whose `next_due_date <= now`.
Returns success/failure per autopay.

get.summary: Admin: List with filters, sort, pagination

post.description:
Perform pg_dump backup for specified tables with optional date range filtering.

- Accepts list of tables with optional `date_column`, `start_date`, `end_date`
- Uses existing `get_db()` session
- Returns backup file info on success

get.description: Retrieve all backup records from the database.

schema.title: Response List Backups Backup Backup  Get

delete.description: Delete backup record from DB and optionally remove the file.

post.description: Restore backup using `pg_restore`. Runs in background.

Request body: AutoPayReportFilter (JSON)
Returns JSON list or downloadable file (CSV/Excel/PDF).

Request body: OfferReportFilter
Returns: JSON list or downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF
Pagination will be skipped if either limit==0 or offset==0 (per your requirement).

Request body: PlanReportFilter
Returns JSON list or downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF.
Pagination will be skipped if either limit==0 or offset==0.

Request body: ReferralReportFilter
Returns JSON list or a downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF file.
Pagination is applied only when both limit>0 AND offset>0; otherwise pagination is skipped.

Generates Role Permissions report with filters, ordering, pagination, and export options.
Pagination applies only when both limit>0 and offset>0.

Request body: SessionsReportFilter
Returns JSON list or downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF.
Pagination is skipped if either limit==0 or offset==0 (i.e., applied only when limit>0 and offset>0).

Request body: TransactionsReportFilter
Returns JSON list or downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF.
Pagination is skipped if either limit==0 or offset==0 (i.e., applied only when limit>0 and offset>0).

Request body: UsersArchiveFilter
Returns JSON list or downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF.
Pagination is applied only when both limit>0 and offset>0. Otherwise returns all results / exports all results.

Request body: UsersReportFilter
Returns JSON list or downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF.
Pagination applied only when both limit>0 and offset>0. Otherwise skip pagination.

Request body: TransactionsReportFilter
Returns JSON list or downloadable CSV/Excel/PDF.
Pagination is skipped if either limit==0 or offset==0 (i.e., applied only when limit>0 and offset>0).

get.description: Returns a comprehensive users report with counts, trends, distributions and growth rates.

post.description:
Receives content details (title, body) and the image file in a single
multipart/form-data request, saves the image, and links the content.

role_name.title: Role Name
role_name.description: Name of the role to assign

next_due_date.title: Next Due Date
next_due_date.description: When the next recharge should happen

tables.title: Tables
tables.description: List of tables with optional date ranges

plan_id.title: Plan Id
plan_id.description: ID of the plan to subscribe

source.description: Source of the transaction (recharge, autopay, etc.)

table_name.title: Table Name
table_name.description: Name of the table to backup

date_column.title: Date Column
date_column.description: Column name for date filtering (e.g., 'created_at'). Set to null for full table backup.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Start date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Required if date_column is set.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: End date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Required if date_column is set.

phone_number.title: Phone Number
phone_number.description: If omitted, top-up the authenticated user's wallet
